item.name: Get user info by username with optional display parameter
Delete a user stored ingredient by ID
Add an ingredient to your stored ingredients
Delete current user and all associated data (cascade)
Change password by email or token

response.name: Password recovery email sent or password changed successfully

item.name: Get paged reviews for a recipe
Submit a review for a recipe
Count recipes by meal type or dish type

response.name: Unauthorized - User must be authenticated for certain filters
OK
Internal server error
List of ingredient names retrieved successfully

item.name: Get paged ingredients (ordered by id desc)

response.name: OK
